title: BLACK SCREEN AFTER ACCEPTING MATCH
body: AS SOON AS I FIND A MATCH AND I ACCEPT IT THE SCREEN GOES BLACK FOR ABOUT 1 MINUTE THEN TAKES ME BACK TO THE HOMESCREEN TELLING ME I FAIL TO CHOOSE A CHAMPION

replies.body: This issue usually happens when you are unable to reach our game servers due to a connection issue.  We have a[ Connection Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide that should help get this fixed up for you.  I recommend testing it out in custom games to prevent any penalties from accruing on your account.
